Michael J. de la Merced / New York Times:
AI sales startup Clay launches its second employee tender offer in under nine months, valuing it at $5B, up from $3.1B in August and $1.5B in its May 2025 offer  —  The company is part of a newer generation of software upstarts holding multiple tender offers where workers can sell stock before going public.

items.title: Stanley’s steel 5-piece Adventure Pre-Party Nesting Shot Glass Set hits $14.50 Amazon low
items.summary:
Stanley Adventure Pre-Party Nesting Shot Glass Set

Buy for $14.50 (Reg. $19.50)

What we love

While billed as a pre-party nesting shot glass bundle, and I’m sure it works just great for that, this little cup and jug set can come in handy in loads of ways out in the wild (or just about anywhere). You’re once again getting a set of rugged stainless steel drinking vessels here with a set of four 2-ounce shot cups and a larger container with lid along with them.

items.title: Deep discount strikes Anker’s $100 3-in-1 15W Qi2 MagGo wireless charging pad at $50 (All-time low)
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on Anker chargers, Woot is offering the brand’s 3-in-1 15W Qi2 MagGo wireless charging pad in black for $49.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). You’re looking at a regularly $100 unit that can top up your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch simultaneously. Amazon currently has a “Used: Like New” unit listed for $49.99 shipped, but Woot’s offer highlighted here gets you a new one for the same price. We’ve previously seen it drop to $51 before completely selling out, but today’s deal lands it a touch lower with a 50% discount. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this multi-device charger, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
